dialogue:
'$player. It's good to see you again.'
'Listen. I hope I can trust you on this. To be honest I don't have much choice - or time. I need your help. It's vital you pay closer attention to what's going on...'

reward.message:
Jordan pushes a small coin or medal into your hand.
'Here take this.'
'It's a symbol of trust for the group I work for.' 'It's extremely old, fragile and can only be given willingly.'
'Others in our circle of trust will imediately know you have it.'

As you close your hand on the coin you feel a short searing pain. Your mind fogs over and you feel the world shift beneath your feet.
You open your hand and discover nothing but grains of sand.
You brush the sand away and notice a sideways '8' symbol burned into your palm.
As the mental fog starts to clear to have a strong feeling of vertigo.
